duties_responsibilities.duty: Daily maintenance of client accounting records, journal entries, and review of accounts payable invoices.
Provide client service, recording and analyzing transactions, reconciliations, and preparation of financial workpaper packages.
Preparation and review of cash reporting and payments via wire and checks.
Maintenance of client and investor wiring instructions across multiple entities.
Monthly or quarterly client financial report preparation, including bank account reconciliations.
Preparation and coordination of annual tax packages.
Preparation and review of quarterly accounts receivable invoices.
Onboarding new clients and communication with clients.
Participation in client planning meetings and completion of special projects at the direction of the client and/or management.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree in accounting or related field or working towards Associates degree with 2+ yrs of bookkeeping experience.
Proficiency with software related products such as Microsoft Excel.
